title:
It looks like there is an easement and a gate at the rear of Halyburton Park so people could access it from adjacent neighborhoods without having to brave the traffic on 17th or drive to the park instead.  Why is this gate always locked?  Will it ever be opened?  

Trying to ride our bikes along 17th to the main entrance without a sidewalk is difficult, and driving to the park to ride bikes there seems to defeat the purpose.
